Juhl. - at
DANTE B. FASCELL
JOHN R. BUCKLEY
MINirmATIVE ASSISTANT
12th District, Florida
COMMITTEES:
IEMBER: INTER-AMERICAN AFFAIRS
SUBCOMMITTEE
April 25, 1967
Mrs. Marjorie Newman
Program Director, WFSU-FM
The Florida State University
Tallahassee, Florida 32306
Dear Mrs. Newman:
Thank you for your letter.
I certainly share your conviction that educational
radio has made an outstanding contribution to the general
field of education. I am certain that a majority of the
Members of Congress share my sentiments in this regard.
Your suggestion that radio be given equal recog¬
nition in the title of any new law establishing public financial
support for educational broadcasting is a good one and I have
called your views on this subject to the attention of Chairman
Harley Staggers of the House Commerce Committee. A copy of
the letter to Congressman Staggers is enclosed.
Once again, let me thank you for contacting me con¬
cerning this matter.
Sincerely.
DBFsFsm
Enclosure
